data.eml:eml: Sclerotinia cirsii-spinosissimi, a new species from the Alps

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Beatrice Senn-Irlet, Martina Peter (2016): Sclerotinia cirsii-spinosissimi, a new species from the Alps. Ascomycete. org 8 (5): 235-240, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.1040189
